posts.post_content:
Posted By: cmoking
Looking to trade/sell these T206 SGC graded cards.  Email cmoking@yahoo.com for scans.  I'm looking for T206 SGC 40-60 cards with Polar Bear, Sovereign, Tolstoi, EPDG, American Beauty and Old Mill backs.  Also looking for other T206s with any back that I'm missing in my set.  Please email me to let me know what you have.  

Other cards I'd consider (SGC only please): T205 SGC 40/50, M116, Diamond Stars SGC 80+

T206 SGC 60:
Molly Miller Piedmont SLer $350
Dutch Revelle Piedmont SLer $400

T206 SGC 50
